channel.title: Editor on PR

item.title: iForce - Sublime text plugin for salesforce development.
item.description: I wrote a small plugin for sublime text to develop salesforce. I’m glad to share one of my idea to project execution.

item.title: How to view (Windows) line ending characters on Mac OSX
item.description: Notepad++ on windows has this beautiful option “View all characters” to display all invisbile characters such as line endings. Programming editors on mac like Textwrangler and Textmate has an option to Show Invisibles but failed to display the character block for Carriage Return as Notepad used to.
